file_content.text: If it weren't for Fort Garnik, we'd all be speaking separatist right now. This is the last home of freedom on Ord Mantell.
Seps made their charge on this fort once--souped-up speeders, a few heavy arms. It didn't go well for them.
Look at the size of this place! Where'd the seps get the money to build something like this?
I can't believe the seps were able to build this place. It must've taken years.
